title: Sunbeam Entrance
narrative: A wide cavern mouth where golden light spills onto a carpet of emerald moss.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of a cave entrance with bright sunbeams hitting green mossy ground, retro gaming aesthetic, vibrant colors.

title: Ivy-Clad Walls
narrative: The limestone walls are completely hidden behind a curtain of thick, creeping ivy.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of cave walls covered in dense green ivy vines, small yellow flowers, pixelated textures.

title: The Glistening Pool
narrative: A crystal clear pond reflecting the sky visible through a hole in the cave ceiling.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of an underground pond reflecting blue sky, surrounded by ferns and stones, top-down perspective.

title: Giant Mushroom Grove
narrative: Massive fungi with glowing caps thrive in the humid, sun-drenched corners of the cave.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of oversized colorful mushrooms under a beam of light inside a cave, magical atmosphere.

title: Hanging Vine Swing
narrative: Long, sturdy vines hang from the ceiling, swaying gently in the subterranean breeze.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of thick green vines hanging from a cave roof, light filtering through leaves, retro platformer style.

title: Prehistoric Fern Path
narrative: Ancient ferns grow tall along this narrow path, their fronds damp with morning dew.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of a path lined with tall prehistoric ferns, pixelated dew drops, lush green palette.

title: The Solar Altar
narrative: A flat stone pedestal perfectly positioned to catch the midday sun.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of a stone altar in a cave illuminated by a single vertical shaft of light, mystical vibes.

title: Intertwined Root Bridge
narrative: Massive tree roots have grown across a chasm, forming a natural walkway.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of a bridge made of thick brown roots and green moss over a dark pit inside a cave.

title: The Pollen Chamber
narrative: The air here is thick with golden dust floating in the light like tiny stars.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of a cave room filled with floating yellow pixel particles and bright light beams.

title: Hidden Meadow Patch
narrative: Against all odds, a small patch of wildflowers blooms where the sun hits the cave floor.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of a small patch of grass and wildflowers inside a dark cave, high contrast lighting.

title: Dewy Grotto
narrative: Water drips from stalactites onto lush succulent plants growing in the cracks.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of cave stalactites dripping onto green succulents, wet stone texture, vibrant pixel art.

title: Giant Lily Pond
narrative: An indoor lake filled with lily pads large enough to stand on.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of massive green lily pads on blue cave water, sunlight reflecting off the ripples.

title: The Great Ceiling Root
narrative: A colossal root from a tree above pierces the cave ceiling, stretching toward the floor.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of a massive vertical tree root descending from a cave ceiling, surrounded by light rays.

title: Butterfly Sanctuary
narrative: Hundreds of blue butterflies flutter around a cluster of sun-loving orchids.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of blue pixel butterflies flying around purple cave orchids, bright and colorful.

title: Crystal Succulent Shelf
narrative: Small succulents grow nestled between glowing quartz crystals on a sunlit ledge.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of translucent crystals and green plants on a rocky cave shelf, shiny pixel effects.

title: The Verdant Waterfall
narrative: A gentle waterfall pours over a moss-covered cliff into a shallow basin.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of a small waterfall inside a cave, rocks covered in thick green moss, sparkling water.

title: Thorny Bramble Tunnel
narrative: A passage choked with flowering brambles that are as beautiful as they are sharp.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of a cave tunnel filled with thorny green bushes and red berries, retro RPG style.

title: Seedling Nursery
narrative: A quiet, protected alcove where hundreds of small sprouts are reaching for the light.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of many tiny green sprouts in a cave corner, soft light illumination, peaceful atmosphere.

title: Ancient Tree Core
narrative: The heart of the cave where a massive ancient trunk reaches all the way to the surface.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of a huge tree trunk inside a cave, leaves visible at the top, sunlight pouring down the sides.

title: Overgrown Exit Arch
narrative: The way out is framed by a natural stone arch draped in flowering jasmine.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art of a cave exit looking out into a bright forest, framed by white flowers and vines.
